statements.statement: SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), A.WORK_DATE, 121) AS CONNECT_DT, A.IP, A.USER_ID, B.USER_NM, C.MENU_PARENT_ID, C.MENU_PARENT_NM, C.MENU_PARENT_ID + ' : ' + C.MENU_PARENT_NM AS LARGE_MENU, A.MENU_ID, C.MENU_NM, A.MENU_ID+' : '+C.MENU_NM AS SMALL_MENU , A.REMARK + (CASE WHEN A.BUTTON_ID = 'btnSearch' OR A.BUTTON_ID = 'btnRestore' THEN '_' + A.BUTTON_ID ELSE '' END) AS REMARK FROM HI_WEB_BUTTON A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MA_USER B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.MENU_ID, A.MENU_NM, A.MENU_PARENT_ID, B.MENU_NM AS MENU_PARENT_NM FROM MA_MENU A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM FROM MA_MENU WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MENU_LEVEL = 1) B ON A.MENU_PARENT_ID = B.MENU_ID WHERE A.MENU_LEVEL = 2 )C ON A.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID WHERE A.WORK_DATE BETWEEN CONVERT(datetime, #FR_DT#+' 00:00:00',20) AND CONVERT(datetime, #TO_DT#+' 23:59:59',20) AND (A.USER_ID LIKE #USER_ID#+'%' OR B.USER_NM LIKE #USER_ID#+'%') AND C.MENU_PARENT_ID = CASE WHEN #MENU_PARENT_ID# = '' THEN C.MENU_PARENT_ID ELSE #MENU_PARENT_ID# END AND A.MENU_ID = CASE WHEN #MENU_ID# = '' THEN A.MENU_ID ELSE #MENU_ID# END AND A.MENU_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT MENU_ID FROM MA_AUTHGROUP_CONTROL WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE AUTHGROUP_ID IN ( SELECT AUTHGROUP_ID FROM MA_AUTHGROUP_USER WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = #REG_ID# ) ) ORDER BY SEQ

SELECT MENU_ID AS CODE_ID, MENU_NM AS CODE_NM FROM MA_MENU WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MENU_LEVEL = 1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND POPUP_YN = 'N'
SELECT MENU_ID AS CODE_ID, MENU_NM AS CODE_NM FROM MA_MENU WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE MENU_LEVEL = 2 AND MENU_PARENT_ID = (CASE WHEN #PARENT_ID# = '' THEN MENU_PARENT_ID ELSE #PARENT_ID# END) AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND POPUP_YN = 'N' AND MENU_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT MENU_ID FROM MA_AUTHGROUP_CONTROL WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE AUTHGROUP_ID IN ( SELECT AUTHGROUP_ID FROM MA_AUTHGROUP_USER WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = #REG_ID# ) )
